DOC.HEADLINE: HUNGARY ' S SOCIALISTS CHOOSE PREMIER
DOC.TEXT: Gyula Horn , Hungary ' s last Communist foreign_minister , was chosen on Saturday by his winning Socialist_Party to be the new prime_minister . Horn and his government must be confirmed by Parliament . But his Socialists , a reform wing of the former Communists , won a majority in last month ' s elections , virtually ensuring that he will be the new head of government . The 62-year-old Horn has vowed to continue Hungary ' s transition to a market_economy , and on Saturday he reiterated his desire to have a coalition government .
